text: Northern Arizona University is a public university in Flagstaff, Arizona. The university has about 22,204 students. It was founded in 1899. The current president of the university is Jos√© Luis Cruz Rivera. ==Sports== The men's athletics teams of the university are called the Lumberjacks. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the Big Sky Conference. ==Other websites== *Northern Arizona University's Official website *Northern Arizona Lumberjacks' Official athletics website Category:Big Sky Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Arizona Category:Flagstaff, Arizona Category:1899 establishments in the United States
title: Northern Arizona University
